question: The property used to change the font style in CSS (like italic) is _______.
The CSS property used to add shadow to text is _______.
The CSS property used to change the type of cursor when hovering over an element is _______.
The property used to make elements float to the left or right is _______.
The CSS property used to clear floated elements is _______.
The CSS property used to control the visibility of an element is _______.
The property used to apply a background image in CSS is _______.
The property used to repeat or not repeat a background image is _______.
The property used to set the maximum width of an element in CSS is _______.
The property used to create rounded corners in CSS is _______.
